Hurt Locker was done even before that, but resurrected for the second time. When this, one of the best movies ever (IMO) has been upped for the first time (on blown star) only few people got it, even if I have "screamed" how good it is. Now, almost a year later, everybody talk about this for Oscar nominated film and after movie has won Golden Globes and like dozens of awards on all movie Festivals. Definitely, absolutely, totally - "must see". Neglected, never talked about (much like "The lucky ones") this movie needed almost two years (since screenings) to be recognized at all. Grab one, whoever read this...

Quote:
but I would not encode "Morgans"... I cannot stand main female part almost organically...

@stev: ROFL, "can't stand" can be broadly interpreted in these ways:

-you cannot endure something
-you cannot tolerate something

Another idiom that is similar in meaning is '(can't) put up with'. In this case I can't endure and ...LOL... "organically" is like "every fiber of my being" - which is - true.

Glad I made you laugh.
